title: Anna University Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Project Assistant Post
description: Anna University has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech in Electrical Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the Anna University Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply before t...
